chapter.title: Modularizing resources
chapter.para: DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DRY) is a common principle of sofware development that aimed at reducing repetition of information of all kinds. In this section, we will focus how aspects that helps to improve resource processing.

section.title: Using generics
